product_name: The North Face Take Flannel Shirt - Men's
long_description: The North Face Take Flannel shirt encourages you to take a stand against cold weather. Hollow core polyester flannel furnishes warmth and dries quickly, without feeling bulky. Fabric feels soft as cotton, with the moisture-wicking benefits of polyester. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. 2 chest pockets provide ample room for trail essentials. Unique stitching details and contrasting plaid on back neck add visual pop. The North Face Take Flannel shirt offers excellent warmth at a very light weight.
short_description: The North Face Take Flannel shirt encourages you to take a stand against cold weather.
